channel.title: Katrīna Cīrule on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Katrīna Cīrule on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Blood Runs Quicker
item.description: Tryna find good out of everything i do When there’s a negative it always involves you In my chest tryna break through No need to hide it No need to hide it’s true Don’t bring me down Spread across the ground Hoping that you’ll fix me I know you’re bad for me babe But my heart still flickers How can i run from you babe When my blood runs quicker I’m tryna repair the mess That we’re made But it’s hard to be positive When all we ever do is hate You’re in my head screaming my name I’m not gonna lie I’ve been trying to let you fade so Don’t bring me down Spread across the ground Hoping that you’ll fix me I know you’re bad for me babe But my heart still flickers How can i run from you babe When my blood runs quicker
